title: Another Magazine body text Typeface
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know what Another Magazine’s body copy Typeface is? Or perhaps a nice a complimentary body text typeface for a header with DIN and Ms Eaves..?

Thanks,  
Sp

 [‹ Anyone still using Quark? (Also InDesign CS3)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203322/http:/typophile.com/node/42202 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please suggest a sans serif typeface family that will work with Platelet as the display text. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203322/http:/typophile.com/node/50328 "Go to next forum topic")
author: splavsic
